hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: If you see something suspicious, bomb it!

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #the Megaton Hammer#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #2# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Zora Scale#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Compass Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Cojiro# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Wallet#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the Development branch may be unstable.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Bombs (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Right Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Deku Shield# and #an Ice Trap#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Deku Stick# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Slingshot Room Side Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #1# major item.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Purple Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Zora Shop#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #House of Skulltula#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Boomerang# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.
